experience: You and Drew both know Jake Weiss
Drew can introduce you to 3 people at EarthLink Internet

Currently oversee the company's software strategy and advise on corporate priority and vision. Major initiatives have been a move to cloud development and improving the development processes at Precision. Over the years, our team has created a suite of applications that increased operational efficiency 10x and we've grown from two engineers in one office to a distributed team of twenty working remotely across two main offices.

Participated in and oversaw the development of a Ruby on Rails application for commercial real estate professionals with the help of a remote team in Belarus.Shared in successfully raising a seed round of funding and helped transition the product to the existing management team.

Worked as part of the eDiscovery team, designing and implementing support tools using C#, Objective-C, and proprietary scripting languages.Developed in-house applications to gain competitive advantages not attainable through the use of third party tools.

Started as a testing intern while finishing up my degree in Computer Science. After graduation, moved to the software development team.As part of the development team, built the update module for the TotalAccess software suite. Other accomplishments included working on low level application services for interaction with VoIP clients and a plugin framework to promote modular product development.Promoted to manager of the Windows Software Development team and responsible for the development of EarthLink's successor to their TotalAccess suite.

I worked with Drew for much of his career at EarthLink, both on the same and on different teams.  What impressed me most about Drew, was his ability to open communcation channels between teams that seemed to have troubles with doing that.  This was exceedingly evident when he moved from QA to Dev at EarthLink.  He really made a difference in helping to open communcation channels between Dev, QA, and Production/Release Engineering teams at that time, which aided in improving build source handoffs and overall improvements to the software release process at EarthLink.  I've seen Drew grow from a QA intern to his current Clent Software Manager position at EarthLink, and I feel that his progression has been well deserved as he's a great guy to work with, and he can also put the hammer down when needed.   Would I work with Drew again?  You bet I would!

I have had the opportunity to work with Drew over the past three years on various projects, both in his capacity as a developer and in his role as a manager.  From the moment I met Drew I was impressed with his openness towards people and his sincere willingness to listen.  These qualities are what make him excel as a manager, along with, his impeccable communication skills and ability to adapt to situations.  In his initial meetings as a new manager there was constant praise from the project team about how he immediately added value to the product.  Also, his technical skills are excellent.  He dives into problems and when looking at his code it is apparent how much thought has gone into it.  I strongly recommend Drew for any position and feel he would be an invaluable employee for any company.

October 5, 2007, Donna worked with Drew in the same group

Donna is simply one of a kind. I have been fortunate enough to work with Donna for over 3 years now and not a day goes by without her finding a way to impress me yet again.As a developer, Donna is always expanding her skill set. She takes on new challenges (many times in very high pressure situations) when most other developers try to stay in their comfort zones. She approaches these challenges with such focus and dedication that it's no wonder that she not only completes them, but excels at them. All the while making it look easy and doing it with a smile.Add that with her ability to communicate effectively and to motivate those around her, and it's obvious why she is so well respected among her peers. Donna is an extremely technical engineer, who everyone enjoys being around and who leads by example. She provides all you would want as a teammate. She is a natural leader, always aware of the needs of her friends and coworkers, and goes out of her way to make sure that everyone is well taken care of.That said, I know that Donna would be an asset to any organization she chooses to join.
